item.title: Primary Key across Tables
item.description: Problem At times we might need uniqueness constraint for a common column across tables. Let’s say we’ve a bunch of products a retailer sells e.g. books, toys and dresses. Each kind of items needs its own table as they’ll have different inherent properties e.g. {author, pages} for books, {weight, colour} for toys and {material, fit} for dress.
